message.content:
cs.IT, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.MM, cs.LG. 

The paper deals with the problem of training optimization for estimating a MIMO flat fading channel, which is a topic related to information theory (cs.IT) and networked systems (cs.NI). The paper also introduces a more general framework for training sequence design, which can be applied to various performance metrics, indicating a systems and control (cs.SY) perspective. The paper focuses on specific applications related to channel estimation and equalization, which are topics related to multimedia (cs.MM) and machine learning (cs.LG).
